banner.title: We protect people, processes and relationships anywhere in the world.

security.question: Is your company really protected?
security.subtitle: Invisible risks can be costly. Find out if your business is exposed.

diagnosis.title: Quickly diagnose your business
diagnosis.text: Mentally answer: is your business exposed to any of these risks?

labor.title: Labor Risks
labor.description: Lawsuits, fines and labor liabilities that can arise at any time.

compliance.title: Compliance Failures
compliance.description: Non-compliance with laws and regulations that can paralyze your operations.

lgpd.title: LGPD Vulnerability
lgpd.description: Data breaches and non-compliance with the General Data Protection Law.

operational.title: Operational Inefficiency
operational.description: Inefficient processes that reduce productivity and increase costs.

cta.title: Did you identify any of these risks?
cta.description: Don't wait for the problem to happen. Prevention is the best strategy.

model.title: The PRHIMA Model
model.subtitle: The PRHIMA doesn't rent people. We take the risk for you.

employment.title: Employment Bond

benefits.description: Complete benefits management and work schedule control.

legal.title: Legal Risk
legal.description: We assume all labor and social security risks.

cta.title: Ready to focus on what really matters?
cta.description: Leave bureaucracy and labor risks with us. Your company is free to grow.

social.title: Social Proof
social.quote: Numbers don't lie. Trust is built with real results.

description.line1: Outsourcing exposed to risks without adequate protection can compromise your company

copyright.line2: Experts in legal protection and labor compliance.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: A journey marked by innovation, expansion and commitment to excellence

2015.title: National Consolidation
2015.text: We expanded our operations to the main states of Brazil, consolidating the brand as a reference in people management and compliance.

2020.title: The 360° Ecosystem
2020.text: We launched the PRHIMA 360° model, integrating Recruitment, Outsourcing, Compliance and Organizational Climate into a strategic ecosystem.

2023.title: International Expansion
2023.text: We began our global expansion with strategic bases in the USA and Portugal, offering support to clients.

vision.title: Our Global Vision
vision.text: To be the largest corporate shielding network integrating customized solutions for each client.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: To shield companies and people through ethical and intelligent management.

companyVision.title: Vision
companyVision.text: To be the global reference in corporate shielding, expanding our impact through a network of high-performance franchisees.

hero.title: Our Global Presence
hero.subtitle: With strategic bases in the Americas, Europe and Asia, we offer a truly global ecosystem for talent management and operations.

brasil.title: Brazil
